title: Lesson 09 – One Minute Spanish
description: In lesson 9 of One Minute Spanish you will learn to ask people how they’re feeling and to answer the question yourself. If you can’t wait ten weeks for our entire course you can access the premium version of the entire course immediately. This features a lesson guide, video versions of each lesson featuring the […]
content:encoded:
In lesson 9 of One Minute Spanish you will learn to ask people how they’re feeling and to answer the question yourself.

If you can’t wait ten weeks for our entire course you can access the premium version of the entire course immediately. This features a lesson guide, video versions of each lesson featuring the words and phrases on the screen of your computer or mobile device as you listen, and an enhanced ebook which features the text and the video content and can be played on iPodTouch, iPhone and iPad through the iBooks app. Click on ‘purchase membership’ below to access all these resources for a one-off payment of £7.99.

Purchase Membership | Members’ Materials | iTunes | RSS
